widgets.label: ^angle-down
widgets.onValue:
var [mixer, strip, plugin] = get('fx_id').split('/')


switch (value) {
  case 'Copy':
    storage.setItem(plugin + '/clipboard', stateGet('comp'))
    break
  case 'Paste':
    stateSet(storage.getItem(plugin + '/clipboard') || {})
    break
  case 'Load':
    send(`/${mixer}/call`, 'load_fx_state', strip, plugin, 'remote_mix')
    break
  case 'Reset':
    send(`/${mixer}/call`, 'load_fx_state',  strip, plugin, 'default_mix')
    break
}

set(this, '', {script:false})

widgets.label: ^angle-down
widgets.onValue:
var [mixer, strip, plugin] = get('fx_id').split('/')


switch (value) {
  case 'Copy':
    storage.setItem(plugin + '/clipboard', stateGet('eq'))
    break
  case 'Paste':
    stateSet(storage.getItem(plugin + '/clipboard') || {})
    break
  case 'Load':
    send(`/${mixer}/call`, 'load_fx_state', strip, plugin, 'remote_mix')
    break
  case 'Reset':
    send(`/${mixer}/call`, 'load_fx_state',  strip, plugin, 'default_mix')
    break
}

set(this, '', {script:false})

widgets.label: VAR{label, CONFIRM}
widgets.onValue:
var aid = getVar('confirm_modal', 'action_id'),
    address = getProp(aid, 'address'),
    args = getProp(aid, 'preArgs')
    
send(address, ...args)
set('confirm_modal', 0)

widgets.label: EQ
widgets.onValue:
set('eq_modal', 0)
set('comp_modal', 0)
set('fx_id', getProp(this, 'comments'))
set('eq_modal_label', getProp('parent','variables').name + ' > ' + 'Equalizer')
set('eq_modal', 1)

widgets.label: COMP
widgets.onValue:
set('eq_modal', 0)
set('comp_modal', 0)
set('fx_id', getProp(this, 'comments'))
set('comp_modal_label', getProp('parent','variables').name + ' > ' + 'Compressor')
set('comp_modal', 1)
